Articles.Content:
Why do they have to have so many variants of the same aircraft which are barely different?

so you can have two of the same high level aircraft at once
Hofugir in-game and i LOVE the Migs although i havent got to that rank yet(Watched some vids) Warthunder is awesome.
People getting butthurt because they die... The community of the game makes sure i'm constantly wagging whether to quit or just try and ignore the crybabies...
No one likes dying. Its annoying when you get one-burst killed. But perhaps just try to ignore the community in the first place?
Just hit level 7 overall and level 4 germany last night.

people shouldn't be crying because a mechanic in the game happened to take place, i get one-shot by bombers gunners constantly, doesn't mean i'm going to start screaming at him in chat. If you chase a guy that is on higher altitude than yourself, then get in a head on with him, you can expect to die, not his fault you're dumb enough to climb up to him right beneath him.

Edited June 9, 2013 by Manifest

people shouldn't be crying because a mechanic in the game happened to take place, i get one-shot be bombers gunners constantly, doesn't mean i'm going to start screaming at him in chat. If you chase a guy that is on higher altitude than yourself, then get in a head on with him, you can expect to die, not his fault you're dumb enough to climb up to him right beneath him.

Those people probably need to take a break from the game if they get angry at the game mechanics. Unfortunately, they can't think of that and keep playing and keep getting angrier and take it out on the chat.

Just hit level 7 overall and level 4 germany last night.

Nice, I cant remember what my overall level is but I'm level 2 America, level 3 Germany, level 2 Russian, level 5 Britain and level 2 Japan.
I think I'm around Lvl 9-10 overall with Americans: 7, Germans: 5, Russians: 4, British: 3, Japanese: 3.

I chased after an He-111 in my new Do217. I scored several hits on it with my cannons, unfortunately nothing critical, but then overshot. What do I do? Hop in the gunner controls and start firing away. It worked. I managed to down the 111 that way.

So 1.31 is out..

Yey for huge patches that rape my internet for several hours...

Oh no. I hate downloading updates. Takes so long for my terrible download speed. Also. We should form a KSP Squadron

Edited June 11, 2013 by KD3

I chased after an He-111 in my new Do217. I scored several hits on it with my cannons, unfortunately nothing critical, but then overshot. What do I do? Hop in the gunner controls and start firing away. It worked. I managed to down the 111 that way.

And it no doubt didn't have a single fighter escorting it, assuming this was high-level bombing?

Oh no. I hate downloading updates. Takes so long for my terrible download speed. Also. We should form a KSP Squadron

We just need to find someone who can afford 2500 golden eagles setting one up...

And a good motto......More Boosters!
Well I got eagles lying around I'm not using, I might set one up when it becomes available.
the other day i was waiting for my bombs to load and i looked up and saw white lights flying about everywhere, sometimes they went into formations and other times they were random, was really creepy.

the other day i was waiting for my bombs to load and i looked up and saw white lights flying about everywhere, sometimes they went into formations and other times they were random, was really creepy.

Ah, those are La-5's
They could also have been Chaikas. Did they spawn swarms of smaller dots? If they did, they were Chaikas.

Planes making new things? I'm very confused....

Also, when we will be able to make our own squadrons: http://warthunder.com/en/news/171/current/

Edit: No, they pushed the date we can start by an extra day http://warthunder.com/en/news/173/current/

Edited June 13, 2013 by LeonG17

I just started plaing War Thunder today, but I already had lots of fun. I even managed to maneuver out a P 40 and help another guy shoot it down with my tiny Heinckel biplane.

IGN: Lordherrmann
I'm scoring kills like crazy with my Yak-9T! That massive cannon might not have a lot of ammunition, but when a single shot can blow both wings off of the enemy, it doesn't need a lot of it!
I love War Thunder. I actually get a good amount of ground kills and actual kills even though I have like a level 3 fighter.

I need a ****ing break from this game,

I mean **** it, it isn't even worth the rage.

I'm not playing for at least a week.

Also lol at the censoring that I didn't notice before, that's cute.
I'm sorry, Mani-niichan! I didn't mean to quit on you, but you didn't seem to be responding.

I'm sorry, Mani-niichan! I didn't mean to quit on you, but you didn't seem to be responding.

Huh? you mean last night? There wasn't anything wrong, it was a game session I just had now that made me decide to quit the game for a week to relax.

I don't have warthunder, YET!

I played Birds of Steel (which is from the same creators and warthunder is like a... sequel to it) on xbox 360 and loved it!

Once I get better hardware next year I'm going to try it.

Oh and my fav plane is the Messerschmidt 163 Komet.

I was better as a bomber and in mounted machine gun too.
